Plot: Each of the women portray one of the characters represented in the collection of twenty poems, revealing different issues that impact women in general and women of color in particular.
Title: For Colored Girls
Actors: Kimberly Elise, Janet Jackson, Loretta Devine, Thandie Newton
tomatoConsensus: Tyler Perry has assembled a fine cast for this adaptation of the 1975 play, and his heart is obviously in the right place, but his fondness for melodrama cheapens a meaningful story.
